SalesAIScoreCycle.name: SalesAIScoreCycle
SalesAIScoreCycle.description: Represents the cycle type and ID used to score records.

CycleType.description: The cycle used to create scores on opportunity records can be one of two types. OpportunityScoreModeling—Provides model factors, which Sales Cloud Einstein uses to build a scoring model. OpportunityScoreScoring—Provides scores and key factors to individual records, which are based on Sales Cloud Einstein’s scoring model.

Name.description: The ID of the cycle. Currently, the name is a system-generated unique value.

SalesAIScoreCycle.accessRules: a Sales Cloud Einstein license with the View Scoring Model Factors permission enabled
